participant_1.background:
My family is supportive of me and my dance team.
I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters.
i only use apple products because i feel everything else is inferior.
i dance ballet.
I am still trying to lose weight.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in the Midwest, but now I live and work remotely from home in a small town in the mountains.
I remember my first purchase of a pickle jar.
I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.
i play guitar on my free time.
i like katy perry as a musician.

content.text: I'm good, thank you! I'm a stay-at-home mom to two daughters and I'm also a ballet dancer. I love to use Apple products and I'm trying to lose weight.
Awesome! I live and work remotely from home in a small town in the mountains. I'm a musician and I like to play guitar. I grew up in the Midwest, but I've been here for the past few years.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to play guitar. I'm not sure why I never have.
It's never too late to learn! It's really fun and it's a great way to relax.
Yeah, I've heard it's very calming. I think I might look into getting a guitar.
That's a great idea! I'm sure you'll love it.
Thanks, I hope so! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to play music, read, and spend time with my friends and family. I also like to go hiking and camping.
Those all sound like really fun things to do! I love hiking and camping too.
Me too! They're great ways to get out and enjoy nature.
Yes, they are! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
Me too! Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a great day!
You too! It was nice talking to you!
